title: The Paths That Be
description: After being woken one night by her deceased grandfather, Tali finds her life forever changed. She has always had an interest in the Law of Attraction and universal energies but nothing could have prepared her for this. From ancient rituals to shape shifting, Tali finds herself on a quest of self awareness that eventually takes her within her dream state where she has to learn to walk in two worlds.
author: Serena Whynd
